document_data.name: ''Lover's Avarice''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lover's Avarice''''' was a [[potion]] created by the [[green hag]] [[Auntie Ethel]] from her underground lair beneath the [[Putrid Bog]].
document_data.Description: While the potion smelled sweet like [[honey]] with a hint of [[rose]]s, there was a lingering scent of rot that accompanied it as well.
document_data.Powers: The imbiber of ''Lover's Avarice'' found themselves feeling weak-willed and less insightful for a matter of a few minutes.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, only one bottle of ''Lover's Avarice'' could be found in Auntie Ethel's [[Ancient Abode]].
